text: Which of the following is/are true regarding Banker’s Algorithm? (@) It only grants resource requests that will keep the system in a “safe” state so that it will have the potential to complete without deadlock. (b) It can always find an allocation of resources that avoids deadlock (c) If it detects an “unsafe” state, then the system is guaranteed to deadlock (d) It is capable of handling threads whose maximum possible resource consumption for a particular resource change over time
